about.description: Gather Cater was born from a simple belief â€” that great gatherings are not just about food, but about how people are brought together. Inspired by a father who loved to host, where every get-together revolved around thoughtfully prepared meals, warm conversations, and effortless flow, Gather Cater exists to help people host with confidence.
about.specialization: We specialise in international, non-regional menus served with genuine Indian hospitality, paired with clean, elegant setups and impeccable coordination. We don't just cater events; we take the responsibility of hosting off your shoulders, so you can focus on your guests, the moments, and the stories that matter.

hostMindset.title: Host's Mindset, Not Caterer's Mindset
hostMindset.description: Most caterers think about quantity, timings, and menu execution. Gather Cater thinks about how guests arrive, how food flows, when grills start, how tables look, and how the host feels.
